Package com.empirilytics.qatch.analyzers

Class LanguageProvider

java.lang.Object
com.empirilytics.qatch.analyzers.LanguageProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
CppProvider, CSharpProvider, JavaProvider, JavaScriptProvider, PythonProvider
public abstract class LanguageProvider extends Object
Base class for LanguageProviders. A LanguageProvicer is a frontend class which provides the access to the analyzers, aggregators, and importes for the tools associated with a language.

    • initialize

      public abstract void initialize(@NonNull @NonNull String configPath, @NonNull @NonNull String resultsPath)

      Parameters:
      configPath - The configuration path for the language, cannot be null or empty
      resultsPath - The results path for the langauge, cannot be null or empty
